name: traced-agent
description: A simple example of an Agent that can edit a document. Traced for Arize Phoenix.

scripts.d:up: docker start arize-phoenix 2>/dev/null || docker run --pull=always -d --name arize-phoenix --rm -p 6006:6006 -e PHOENIX_SQL_DATABASE_URL="sqlite:///:memory:" arizephoenix/phoenix:latest

author: Tony Powell <powell.anthonyd@proton.me>
